David Riches re-skin

Project

  • Me
  • Omega theming 960 Grid HTML5
  • david-riches.co.uk
Brief

Here is the re-skin of my portfolio site, i felt it was about time for a new coat of paint and to look into a responsive approach.


The old site (in black) was originally developed in Wordpress then later transfered into Drupal. (Original theme was based on Display by Kriesi)


This gave me a chance to use the popular Omega 960 , which is a responsive HTML5 base theme targeted at mobile devices.Â I wanted to give the new site a minimilistic look and feel.. I had some feedback about my old logo being a bit hard to read so i decided to ditch that.


Hope you like!
